column5: I am hoping someone can lead an expedition to a back lake up North where we can do some ice fishing. Share gas/expenses.  Anyone else chomping at the bits?  Sleepjigging
I could take you to some good lakes,spots in the timmins area in the summer, but Out of town for school during the winter haha
Come to North Bay. Lakes are starting to feeze good now.

I started this thread when I read about the conditions in Timmins. But it's a little far.  North Bay sounds better.  I am in Toronto, and it's like +7C degrees for the week. I haven't even put on the winter tires yet. It feels warmer than last year.
I made the road trip to North Bay this past weekend and it was worth it. The drive is pretty smooth too, roads wern't bad.
ohh kk, yeah its all frozen up here now!
